entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -38.9°C
Wind: WNW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36 with temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 36 with temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 56 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
